title: Benefits Outweigh the Cost
review: I‚Äôm not someone who usually writes review. I‚Äôm quick to tap a star and move on, but this app has saved me more times than I can count and deserves an actual written review. I suffer from PTSD, anxiety (social & generalized anxiety disorder), insomnia, and to add to that I was diagnosed with cancer. Even before my ‚Äúnew‚Äù diagnosis, almost every night I‚Äôd lay in bed with my mind churning, my anxiety rising, and completely unable to sleep despite extreme exhaustion. Despite medications, I‚Äôd lay awake begging my brain to turn off and begging for even 30 minutes of sleep. This was my life for YEARS battling anxiety and insomnia. The nights I did fall asleep, I had horrific nightmares thanks to my PTSD, then I was back up again worse off then I originally started. It was so bad, despite being exhausted, I‚Äôd beg for daylight just so I could get up since trying to sleep was beyond exhausting. This whole time, my lack of sleep, was just adding to my anxiety. I got to the point where I didn‚Äôt want to leave my house- lack of sleep only makes anxiety worse! After dealing with what I thought was an endless cycle of my life, I found this app. Despite not having a lot of extra money, I found myself buying a 1-month subscription. Can I tell you how worth it that decision was?! It literally changed my life. I found myself relaxed, my mind calm, and before I knew it I was waking up after the sun for a change! It was hard to believe that I was up after the birds and after the sun! My nightmares became less frequent and when I do suffer one due to my PTSD, I reopen this app and immediately calm my mind and fall back to sleep. I found my anxiety more manageable and next thing I knew, I‚Äôm writing a small list of things I need and going to the store myself! Not my husband after work, but me! I finally got back to work, became fully engaged in my kids and husband, and my life! When I was diagnosed with cancer (stage 3), it was a rush of sadness, anxiety, and sleepless nights again. I lost my job since chemo and side effects took over my days. I felt since I was even tighter on money that I shouldn‚Äôt renew my subscription to this app. Lying awake again, my husband wakes up and tells me ‚Äúthe benefits of the Breethe app outweigh the cost and either I‚Äôll click subscribe or you do it.‚Äù He was 100% right. After ‚Äúsuffering‚Äù through a couple months of sleepless nights and chemo during the day, I resubscribed! Despite long days of treatments, financial stress, some depression, and anxiety, I felt great the next day! This app seriously changed my life! The benefits truly outweigh the cost! If you suffer as I have in the past, click subscribe and learn to love yourself, life, and bedtime again! Thank you ‚ÄúBreethe‚Äù and Alicia (Customer Happiness Specialist that helped me during a difficult time) for giving me myself, my kids, my husband - my life back! Despite my battle with cancer still, I‚Äôve never felt better!
